ygData.subject: Re: telescoping lens & pole
ygData.msgSnippet: I know because he showed me both of them.  =).  I can post up screenshots on Tuesday when i get back from vacation, but he did show me both. Xalastile ...
ygData.messageBody:
I know because he showed me both of them. =). I can post up screenshots on
Tuesday when i get back from vacation, but he did show me both.

Xalastile

----- Original Message -----
From: Cleocrazy <cleocrazy@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 10:06 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] telescoping lens & pole


> From: "Cleocrazy" <cleocrazy@...>
>
> how do you know he's telling the truth? there are a lot of BS artists
out
> there. did you actually see these items? and he may have refused to share
> the recipe because he didn't know it. i'll believe it when i see it...
>
> Xiltik
> E'Ci
>
> >Well, I have good news and bad news. The good news is the Telescope Lens
> and
> > Collapsable Fishing Pole CAN be made. And, you DO have to use a
> collapsable
> >fishing pole to make the telescope. Both of these items are makeable.
> >
> >Now for the bad news. The only person I know that can make them WILL NOT
> share
> >the recipe! Can you believe that? He is a gnome on Xegony by the name
of
> >Salvadori, so if you can pry the recipe from him, good luck. I tried.
> Well, also, he
> >said that Tinkering skill improvement had been fixed, and he was up in
the
> 60's on
> >skill. So keep tinkering.
> >
> >Xalastile
> >Level 22 Magician
> >Xegony
>
